
{{alias}}( x )
    Evaluates the complementary error function.

    If provided `NaN`, the function returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: double
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    y: double
        Function value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( 2.0 )
    ~0.0047
    > y = {{alias}}( -1.0 )
    ~-1.8427
    > y = {{alias}}( 0.0 )
    1.0
    > y = {{alias}}( {{alias:@stdlib/math/constants/float64-pinf}} )
    0.0
    > y = {{alias}}( {{alias:@stdlib/math/constants/float64-ninf}} )
    2.0
    > y = {{alias}}( NaN )
    NaN

    See Also
    --------
